alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 8:27PM MDT until June 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Central Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 827 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Kutch, or 21 miles southwest of Limon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Elbert and central Lincoln Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
